snippet: Along with hundreds of lives, the storm wiped out much of the progress that the isolated city, Jérémie, had been making....
abstract: Devastation wrought by Hurricane Matthew on coastal city of Jeremie in Haiti offers in microcosm economic impact of hurricane on poorest country in Western hemisphere; city had been experiencing period of growth until hurricane made landfall, turning back clock to when previous period of prosperity was halted in its tracks by 2010 earthquake.
lead_paragraph: Along with hundreds of lives, the storm wiped out much of the progress that the isolated city, Jérémie, had been making.

headline.main: In Haiti, a City’s Race Into the 21st Century Is Ruined by a Hurricane
headline.print_headline: A Haitian City Was Finally Prospering. Then Came the Storm.
